categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Jedi was a Rodian male who served the Jedi Order in the rank of Padawan during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. He trained alongside Masters Lanius Qel-Bertuk and Kirlocca at the Almas Academy.
